This Morning host Josie Gibson admitted she 'wet herself' while trying out Blackpool Pleasure Beach's newest rollercoaster Icon ahead of opening.
The 35-year-old, who is known for her time on Big Br… [+1485 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Disney Plus’ Hamilton trailer will transport you to the summer of 2016 - Polygon
articles.description: The first trailer for the Disney Plus recording of Hamilton dropped last night and it captures a moment frozen in the summer of 2016. Starring the original cast— including Lin-Manuel Miranda, Leslie Odom Jr., and Daveed Diggs — the recording drops on Disney P…
articles.content: May you always be satisfied

articles.author: Bethany Minelle
articles.title: 'There is no truth to this': Justin Bieber denies sexual assault allegation - Sky News
articles.description: The Canadian singer says the claim which surfaced on Twitter is "factually impossible" and says he will be taking legal action.
